==Voice-Over Notes==
* [[Aloy]] could not receive any dishes and has no voice-overs for this event.
* Prior to completing the {{Quest|Omnipresence Over Mortals}}, the Raiden Shogun's lines are spoken by the Shogun. After completion of that act, the Raiden Shogun's lines are spoken by Ei.
* In [[Version 2.8]], three "Receiving a Gift" voice-overs were added to all characters' profiles in the Character Menu. For characters released prior to the end of Spices From the West, the "Receiving a Gift" voice-overs are the same as the voice-overs during the event.
